Topic.Title: Doctor Who: The Eggs of Destruction

Posts.EditableText:
I've been killing time by playing around with the Quest engine for a while, and, as it happens, out comes a game. It's a little text adventure with (pretty limited, granted) simple graphics set in the world of the TV show Doctor Who, starring the Sixth Doctor of the mid-1980s. It's called Doctor Who: The Eggs of Destruction, and you can play it here:

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/dgknn-j_teuvn81mgb_mdg/doctor-who-the-eggs-of-destruction

It's not too long and I wouldn't be surprised if there are some snags still in the programming I've missed, but if you're a fan of Classic Doctor Who, you might enjoy if for the little romp it is. All feedback is appreciated, though! If you give it a try and come across something that obviously shouldn't be there, let me know and I'll do my best to fix it.
